item.title: Estimating Software Development Time
item.description: What is the need for an “Estimate”, because everything is bound to change rite in actuality.

item.title: Ideas for Successful Agile Teams
item.description: Agile is the most discussed software development methodology, and probably most widely accepted as the way forward for modern software development teams.
